Name: Focus: Caster's Weapon
Requirements: Training with a weapon that can be used as implement
Text:
Choose a weapon when picking this feat.
You do not become Hindered when using the Point Blank Shot maneuver while wielding the chosen weapon.
On weapon attacks with the chosen weapon, deal extra damage:
	- [H] +1 damage per W.
	- [P][E] +2 damage per W.
On implement attacks with the chosen weapon, deal extra damage:
 - [H] +1 damage per damage die.
	- [P][E] +2 damage per damage die.
Summary: With Implement Weapon, +1 damage per W/die, avoid penalty on Point Blank Shot.

Name: Focus: Parrying Staff
Text:
While wielding a Staff, you gain Parry (+1 Arm vs melee attacks)
On weapon attacks with a Staff, deal Miss Damage:
 - [H] +1 Miss Damage per W.
	- [P][E] +2 Miss Damage per W.
On implement attacks with a Staff, deal Miss Damage:
 - [H] +1 Miss Damage per damage die.
	- [P][E] +2 Miss Damage per damage die.
Summary: With Staff, +1 Miss Damage per W/die, +1 Arm vs melee.

Name: Focus: Pushing Staff
Text:
When you make an implement attack with a Staff that causes forced movement, choose a targeted enemy. The forced movement for that enemy is increased by 1 square.
On weapon attacks with a Staff, deal extra damage:
 - [H] +1 damage per W.
	- [P][E] +2 damage per W.
On implement attacks with a Staff, deal extra damage:
 - [H] +1 damage per damage die.
	- [P][E] +2 damage per damage die.
Summary: With Staff, +1 damage per W/die, +1 forced movement.

Name: Dual Focus
Requirements:
Training with an implement.
A weapon attack power.
An implement attack power.
Text:
When picking this feat, choose a weapon and an implement. On weapon attacks with the chosen weapon, deal extra damage:
	- [H] +1 damage per W.
	- [P][E] +2 damage per W.
On implement attacks with the chosen implement, deal extra damage:
 - [H] +1 damage per damage die.
	- [P][E] +2 damage per damage die.
Summary:
With Weapon, +1 damage per W.
With Implement, +1 damage per die.

Name: Energy Focus
Requirements: Attack power with the chosen energy type.
Text:
Special: When you take this feat, choose an energy type.
You do not become Hindered when using the Pierce maneuver.
On weapon attacks with the chosen energy type, deal extra damage and Miss Damage:
 - [H] +1 damage and +1 Miss Damage per W.
	- [P][E] +2 damage and +2 Miss Damage per W.
On implement attacks with the chosen energy type, deal Miss Damage and Miss Damage:
 - [H] +1 damage and +1 Miss Damage per damage die.
	- [P][E] +2 damage and +2 Miss Damage per damage die.
Summary: Choose an energy type. With that type, +1 damage and +1 Miss Damage per W/die. Avoid penalty from Pierce maneuver.

Name: Focus: Pushing Hammer
Text:
When you push an enemy with a weapon attack with a hammer, the forced movement is increased by 1 square.
On weapon attacks with a hammer,deal extra damage:
	- [H] +1 damage per W.
	- [P][E] +2 damage per W.
Summary: With Hammer, +1 damage per W, +1 push.

Name: Focus: Unstoppable Hammer
Text:
On weapon attacks with a hammer, deal Miss Damage:
 - [H] +1 Miss Damage, and an extra +2 Miss Damage per W.
	- [P][E] +2 Miss Damage, and an extra +4 Miss Damage per W.
Summary: With Hammer, deal Miss Damage.

Name: Focus: Unerring Light Blade
Requirements: Weapon Training with a Light Blade
Text: On weapon attacks with a Light Blade and without Advantage, +1 Hit.
Summary: With Light Blade, +1 Hit without Advantage.

Name: Focus: Ambush Light Blade
Requirements: Weapon Training with a Light Blade
Text:
On weapon attacks with a Light Blade and Advantage, gain +1 Crit Range.
	On weapon attacks with a Light Blade, deal Miss Damage:
	- [H] +1 Miss Damage damage per W.
	- [P][E] +2 Miss Damage damage per W.
Summary: With Light Blade, deal Miss Damage, and extra Crit Range with Advantage.

Name: Focus: Skirmisher's Blade
Requirements: Weapon Training with a Light Blade
Text:
When a weapon attack you make with a Light Blade allows you to move or shift, increase the distance moved by 1.
On weapon attacks with a Light Blade, deal extra Damage:
	- [H] +1 Damage damage per W.
	- [P][E] +2 Damage damage per W.
Summary: With Light Blade, +1 damage per W and increase movement granted by attacks.

Name: Focus: Opportunist Heavy Blade
Requirements: Weapon Training with a Heavy Blade
Text:
+2 to Opportunity Attack modifier.
On weapon attacks with a Heavy Blade, deal extra damage:
	- [H] +1 damage per W.
	- [P][E] +2 damage per W.
Summary: With Heavy Blade, +1 damage per W and +2 to Opportunity Attacks.

Name: Focus: Duelist's Blade
Requirements: Weapon Training with a Heavy Blade or a Light Blade
Text:
Your Heavy Blades and Light Blades gain Parry (+1 Arm against melee attacks).
On weapon attacks with a Heavy Blade or Light Blade, deal Miss Damage:
	- [H] +1 Miss Damage damage per W.
	- [P][E] +2 Miss Damage damage per W.
Summary: With Heavy Blade or Light Blade, +1 Miss Damage per W, +1 Arm vs melee.

Name: Focus: Critical Axe
Text:
On weapon attacks with an Axe, deal extra damage, and additional damage on a Crit:
	- [H] +1 damage per W, and +3 damage per W on a Crit.
	- [P][E] +2 damage per W, and +6 damage per W on a Crit.
Summary: With Axe, +1 damage per W, High Crit.

Name: Focus: Piercing Axe
Text:
You do not become Hindered when using the Pierce maneuver.
On weapon attacks with an Axe, deal extra damage:
	- [H] +1 damage per W.
	- [P][E] +2 damage per W.
Summary: With Axe, +1 damage per W, avoid penalty on Pierce maneuver.

Name: Focus: Reaching Spear
Text:
Your Javelins gain +2 Range and +1 Hit, and your Halfspears and Longspears gain +1 Reach.
On weapon attacks with an Spear, deal Miss Damage:
	- [H] +1 Miss Damage damage per W.
	- [P][E] +2 Miss Damage damage per W.
Summary: With Spear, +1 Miss Damage per W, extra Range, Reach.

Name: Focus: Opportunist Spear
Text:
On weapon attacks with an Spear, deal extra damage:
	- [H] +1 damage per W.
	- [P][E] +2 damage per W.
On Opportunity attacks with an Spear, deal extra damage:
	- [H] +4 damage.
	- [P] +12 damage.
 - [E] +24 damage.
Summary: With Spear, +1 damage and +5 Opportunity Attack damage per W.

Name: Focus: Reaching Flail
Text:
Your Flails gain +1 Reach.
On weapon attacks with a Flail, deal Miss Damage:
	- [H] +1 Miss Damage damage per W.
	- [P][E] +2 Miss Damage damage per W.
Summary: With Flail, +1 Miss Damage per W, extra Reach.

Name: Focus: Flurrying Flail
Text:
On weapon attacks with a Flail, deal extra damage:
	- [H] +1 damage per W, and +1 damage per W if the attack had multiple targets.
	- [P][E] +2 damage per W, and +2 damage per W if the attack had multiple targets.
Summary: With Flail, +1 damage per W, and extra damage against multiple targets.

Name: Focus: Close Bow
Text:
You do not become Hindered when using the Point Blank Shot maneuver.
On weapon attacks with a Bow, deal extra damage:
	- [H] +1 damage per W.
	- [P][E] +2 damage per W.
Summary: With Bow, +1 damage per W, and avoid penalty on Point Blank Shot..

Name: Focus: Far Bow
Text:
Your Bows gain +2 Range. On weapon attacks with a Bow, deal extra damage:
	- [H] +1 damage per W.
	- [P][E] +2 damage per W.
Summary: With Bow, +1 damage per W and +2 Range.

Name: Focus: Precision Crossbow
Text:
+1 Hit against enemies with Cover, Superior Cover, Concealment or Total Concealment.
On weapon attacks with a Crossbow, deal extra damage:
	- [H] +1 damage per W.
	- [P][E] +2 damage per W.
Summary: With Crossbow, +1 damage per W, and +1 Hit against targets in Cover or Concealment.

Name: Focus: Penetrating Crossbow
Text:
On weapon attacks with a Crossbow, deal Miss Damage:
 - [H] +1 Miss Damage, and an extra +2 Miss Damage per W.
	- [P][E] +2 Miss Damage, and an extra +4 Miss Damage per W.
Summary: With Crossbow, deal Miss Damage.

Name: Focus: Critical Sling
Text:
On weapon attacks with a Sling, +1 Crit Range.
On weapon attacks with a Sling, deal extra damage:
	- [H] +1 damage per W.
	- [P][E] +2 damage per W.
Summary: With Sling, +1 damage per W, +1 Crit Range.

Name: Focus: Slayer Sling
Text:
On weapon attacks with a Sling, +1 Hit against Large or larger enemies.
On weapon attacks with a Sling, deal extra damage:
	- [H] +1 damage per W.
	- [P][E] +2 damage per W.
Summary: With Sling, +1 damage per W, +1 hit vs Large.

Name: Focus: Weapon Master
Text:
You do not become Hindered when using the Point Blank Shot maneuver.
When using the Draw action, the move distance is increased to half your move speed.
On weapon attacks, deal extra damage:
	- [H] +1 damage per W.
	- [P][E] +2 damage per W.
Summary: With weapons, +1 damage per W. Extra move on Draw maneuver, no penalty on Quick Draw maneuver.

Name: Focus: Far Wand
Text:
On ranged implement attacks with a Wand, +2 range.
On implement attacks with a Wand, deal extra damage:
 - [H] +1 damage per damage die.
	- [P][E] +2 damage per damage die.
Summary: With Wand, +1 damage per die and +3 Range.

Name: Focus: Piercing Wand
Text:
You do not become Hindered when using the Pierce maneuver.
On implement attacks with a Wand, deal extra damage:
 - [H] +1 damage per damage die.
	- [P][E] +2 damage per damage die.
Summary: With Wand, +1 damage per die, avoid penalty on Pierce maneuver.

Name: Focus: Prescient Orb
Text:
+2 Initiative.
On implement attacks with an Orb, deal extra damage:
 - [H] +1 damage per damage die.
	- [P][E] +2 damage per damage die.
Summary: With Orb, +1 damage per die and +2 Initiative.

Name: Focus: Perceptive Orb
Text:
On Implement attacks with an Orb, downgrade enemy Concealment and Total Concealment.
On implement attacks with an Orb, deal extra damage:
 - [H] +1 damage per damage die.
	- [P][E] +2 damage per damage die.
Summary: With Orb, +1 damage per die and downgrade Concealment.

Name: Focus: Sage's Tome
Text:
On implement attacks with a Tome, deal extra damage: - [H] +1 damage per damage die. - [P][E] +2 damage per damage die. You may Sustain Minor as a Free Action. Your summoned creatures deal extra damage:
- [H]:+1 damage
- [P]:+3 damage
- [E]:+6 damage
Summary: With tome, +1 damage per die. Free Sustain Minor, Extra damage on summons.

Name: Focus: Reliable Tome
Text:
When you miss all targets of an encounter attack power for the first time in an encounter, you do not gain Encounter Cooldown.
On implement attacks with a Tome , deal extra damage:
 - [H] +1 damage per damage die.
	- [P][E] +2 damage per damage die.
Summary: With Tome, +1 damage per die, no cooldown on missed encounter attack.

Name: Focus: Critical Rod
Text:
On implement attacks with a Rod, deal extra damage, and additional damage on a Crit:
	- [H] +1 damage per damage die, and +3 damage per damage die on a Crit.
	- [P][E] +2 damage per damage die, and +6 damage per damage die on a Crit.
Summary: With Rod, +1 damage per die, extra damage on Crit.

Name: Focus: Ambush Rod
Text:
On implement attacks with a Rod and Advantage, +1 Crit Range, and deal extra damage:
	- [H] +1 damage per damage die.
	- [P][E] +2 damage per damage die.
Summary: With Rod and Advantage, +1 damage per die, +1 Crit Range

Name: Focus: Healing Symbol
Requirements: Implement Training with a Holy Symbol
Text:
On implement attacks with a Symbol, deal extra damage:
	- [H] +1 damage per damage die.
	- [P][E] +2 damage per damage die.
Targets of your Healing powers gain a bonus to Surge Value:
 - [H] +3 Surge Value
	- [P] +9 Surge Value
 - [E] +18 Surge Value.
Summary: With Holy Symbol, +1 damage per die and healing bonus.

Name: Focus: Shielding Symbol
Requirements: Implement Training with a Holy Symbol
Text:
On implement attacks with a Symbol, deal extra damage:
	- [H] +1 damage per damage die.
	- [P][E] +2 damage per damage die.
Your powers that grant Shield Points grant extra Shield Points
 - [H] +1 SP
	- [P] +3 SP
 - [E] +6 SP
Summary: With Holy Symbol, +1 damage per die and extra SP

Name: Focus: Surging Ki
Requirements: Implement Training with a Ki Focus
Text:
On implement attacks with a Ki Focus, deal extra damage:
	- [H] +1 damage per damage die.
	- [P][E] +2 damage per damage die.
You gain a bonus to Surge Value:
 - [H] +2 Surge Value
	- [P] +6 Surge Value
 - [E] +12 Surge Value.
Summary: With Ki Focus, +1 damage per die, bonus to Surge Value.

Name: Focus: Fast Ki
Requirements: Implement Training with a Ki Focus
Text:
+1 Speed.
On implement attacks with a Ki Focus, deal extra damage:
	- [H] +1 damage per damage die.
	- [P][E] +2 damage per damage die.
Summary: With Ki Focus, +1 damage per die, +1 Speed.

Name: Focus: Opportunist Totem
Text:
+2 Opportunity Attack Modifier.
+2 Hit on Reaction attacks other than Opportunity Attacks.
On implement attacks with a Totem, deal extra damage:
	- [H] +1 damage per damage die.
	- [P][E] +2 damage per damage die.
Summary: With Totem, +1 damage per die, +2 Hit to Opportunity Attacks and Reactions.

Name: Focus: Tough Totem
Text:
Gain extra HP:
- [H]:+2 HP
- [P]:+6 HP
- [E]:+12 HP On implement attacks with a Totem , deal extra damage: - [H] +1 damage per damage die. - [P][E] +2 damage per damage die.
Summary: With Totem, +1 damage per die. Gain extra HP.

Name: Wind Robes
Text: While wearing Cloth Armor, +1 Arm, and +1 Arm vs ranged
Summary: With Cloth, +1 Arm, and +1 Arm vs ranged

Name: Elemental Robes
Text:
When taking this feat, choose one of the following damage types: Fire, Cold, Lightning, Radiant, Psychic.
While wearing Cloth Armor, +1 Arm,  and Resist (chosen damage type).
Summary: With Cloth, +1 Arm, Resist a damage type.

Name: Courtier's Outfit
Text: While wearing Cloth Armor, +1 Arm.\nThe first time in each encounter that you fail a Skill Check for Authority, Trickery or Diplomacy, save to avoid the Morale loss.
Summary: With Cloth, +1 Arm, and bonus to Authority, Trickery, Diplomacy.

Name: Robes of the Scholar
Text: While wearing Cloth Armor, +1 Arm.\nThe first time in each encounter that you fail a Skill Check for Concentration, Lore or Arcana, save to avoid the Morale loss.
Summary: With Cloth, +1 Arm, and bonus to Concentration, Lore, Arcana.

Name: Robes of Will
Text: While wearing Cloth Armor, +1 Arm, +1 Will.
Summary: With Cloth, +1 Arm, +1 Will.

Name: Catsuit Leather
Text: While wearing Leather Armor, +1 Arm.\nThe first time in each encounter that you fail a Skill Check for Stealth, Finesse or Trickery, save to avoid the Morale loss.
Summary: With Leather, +1 Arm, and bonus to Stealth, Finesse or Trickery.

Name: Reflexive Leather
Text: While wearing Leather Armor, +1 Arm, +1 Reflex.
Summary: With Leather, +1 Arm, +1 Reflex

Name: Dodging Leather
Text: While wearing Leather Armor, +1 Arm, and +2 to all defenses against Opportunity attacks.
Summary: With Leather, +1 Arm, +2 all defenses vs Opportunity Attacks

Name: Stout Hide
Text: While wearing Hide Armor, +1 Arm, +1 Fortitude.
Summary: With Hide, +1 Arm, +1 Fortitude

Name: Survivalist's Hide
Text: While wearing Hide Armor, +1 Arm.\nThe first time in each encounter that you fail a Skill Check for Endurance, Nature or Perception, save to avoid the Morale loss.
Summary: With Hide, +1 Arm, and bonus to Endurance, Nature, Perception.

Name: Isolating Hide
Text:
When taking this feat, choose one of the following damage types: Cold. Fire
While wearing Hide Armor, +1 Arm, and Resist (chosen damage type).
Summary: With Hide, +1 Arm, +1 Nature, Resist Cold or Fire

Name: Hiking Hide
Text: While wearing Hide Armor, +1 Arm, and you downgrade the first square of Difficult Terrain you enter each turn.
Summary: With Hide, +1 Arm, downgrade first Difficult Terrain square.

Name: Soldier's Chain
Text: While wearing Chain Armor, +1 Arm.\nThe first time in each encounter that you fail a Skill Check for Athletics, Authority or Endurance, save to avoid the Morale loss.
Summary: With Chain, +1 Arm, and bonus to Athletics, Authority, Endurance.

Name: Caster's Chain
Text: While wearing Chain Armor, +1 Arm. You do not become Hindered when using the Point Blank Shot maneuver.
Summary: With Chain, +1 Arm, avoid penalty on Point Blank Shot.

Name: Mobile Scale
Text: While wearing Scale Armor, +1 Arm, and the Armor Movement Penalty is reduced by 1.
Summary: With Scale, +1 Arm, reduce movement penalty by 1.

Name: Juggernaut Plate
Text: While wearing Plate Armor, +1 Arm, and whenever an enemy attack inflicts forced movement on you, you can Save to reduce the forced movement by 1.
Summary: With Plate, +1 Arm, save to reduce forced movement by 1.

Name: Blast Shield
Text: While wearing a Shield, +1 Arm, and +1 to all Fortitude, Reflex, and Will against Close and Area attacks.
Summary: With Shield, +1 Arm, +1 to Fortitude, Reflex, Will vs Close and Area.

Name: Wind Shield
Text: While wearing a Shield, +1 Arm, and +1 to Fortitude, Reflex, and Will against Ranged attacks.
Summary: With Shield, +1 Arm, +1 to Fortitude, Reflex, Will vs ranged

Name: Bashing Shield
Text: While wearing a Shield, +1 Arm, and when you push an enemy with a melee or close attack, the forced movement is increased by 1 square unless the enemy makes a save.
Summary: With Shield, +1 Arm, increase forced movement by 1 on failed save.

Name: Nimble Armor
Requirements: Training with any Heavy Armor or Heavy Shield Training
Text: +1 Arm, and you ignore any Armor Penalty to skills.
Summary: +1 Arm, ignore Armor Penalty to skills.

Name: Ranged Armor
Requirements: Training with any Heavy Armor or Heavy Shield Training
Text: +1 Arm, and your Armor Penalty to attack range halved.
Summary: +1 Arm, Armor Penalty to range halved.

Name: Toughness
Text:
Gain extra HP:
- [H]:+5 HP
- [P]:+15 HP
- [E]:+30 HP
Summary: +5 HP, scaling with tier.

Name: Surging Toughness
Text:
Increase your Surge Value:
- [H]:+5 Surge Value
- [P]:+15 Surge Value
- [E]:+30 Surge Value
Summary: +5 Surge value, scaling with tier

Name: Die Hard
Text:
+4 to Death Saves.\nGain extra HP:
- [H]:+3 HP
- [P]:+9 HP
- [E]:+18 HP
Summary: +4 to Death Saves and +3 HP, scaling with tier.

Name: Toughness in Numbers
Text:
Increase your Surge Value and the HP of your Animal Companions, Familiars and Summoned creatures:
- [H]:+3 Surge Value, +6 companion HP.
- [P]:+9 Surge Value, +18 companion HP.
- [E]:+18 Surge Value, +36 companion HP.
Summary: +3 Surge value and +6 companion HP, scaling with tier.

Name: Martial Weapon Training
Text: Gain Training in all Simple weapons and One-Hand Martial weapons.
Summary: Training in Simple and One-Hand Martial weapons.

Name: Superior Weapon Training
Text: Gain Training in all Two-Hand Martial weapons
Summary: Training in Two-Hand Martial weapons

Name: Leather Armor Training
Text: Gain Training with Leather Armor
Summary: Training with Leather

Name: Hide Armor Training
Text: Gain Training with Hide Armor
Summary: Training with Hide

Name: Chain Armor Training
Text: Gain Training with Chain Armor
Summary: Training with Chain

Name: Scale Armor Training
Text: Gain Training with Scale Armor
Summary: Training with Scale

Name: Plate Armor Training
Text: Gain Training with Plate Armor
Summary: Training with Plate

Name: Light Shield Training
Text: Gain Training with Light Shield
Summary: Training with Light Shield

Name: Heavy Shield Training
Text: Gain Training with Heavy Shield
Summary: Training with Heavy Shield

Name: Imposing Presence
Text: You gain Aura 1: Squares in the aura count as Difficult Terrain for your enemies.
Summary: Adjacent squares count as Difficult Terrain for enemies

Name: Hamstring Opportunity
Text:
Enemies hit by your Opportunity Attacks and Reaction attacks are Slowed until the end of their next turn.
Gain Advantage against Slowed enemies.
Summary: Opportunity attacks and reaction attacks slow enemies. Advantage against slowed enemies.

Name: Mighty Blow
Text: When you inflict forced movement on an enemy with an attack, the forced movement is increased by 1. Against Forced Movement damage caused by you, your allies gain Resist, and your enemies gain Vulnerable.
Summary: Forced movement from attacks increased by 1. Forced Movement Damage bonus.

Name: Pain Insensitivity
Text:
+1 Fortitude.
Your powers that grant you Shield Points grant extra Shield Points
 - [H] +2 SP
	- [P] +6 SP
 - [E] +12 SP
Summary: +1 Fortitude. Bonus to gained SP.

Name: Constant Vigilance
Text:
+1 Will.
You can use Reactions and make Opportunity Attacks while Dazed,  Stunned or Dominated.
Your Reaction Attacks ignore any penalties from Weakened, Blinded, Taunted.
Summary: +1 Will. Can use Reactions, Opportunity attacks while dazed, stunned. Your Reactions ignore penalties from Weakened, Blinded, Taunted.

Name: Unstoppable Defender
Text:
+1 Reflex.
Whenever you are subject to any of the following effects, as a Free Reaction (Interrupt) you can make a save to downgrade the effect: Slowed, Immobilized, Restrained, Grabbed, Prone, Forced Movement.
Note: Any effect from the attack other than the prevented Condition or Forced Movement remains unaffected.
Summary: +1 Reflex. Save to downgrade Slowed, Immobilized, Restrained, Grabbed, Prone, Forced Movement.

Name: Persuasive Taunt
Text: When ignoring taunts, enemies taunted by you gain -1 to hit, and an additional -2 to hit with Opportunity Attacks.
Summary: Enemies ignoring your taunt gain -1 hit, -2 hit with Opportunity Attacks.

Name: Deadly Taunt
Text: Enemies taunted by you gain Vulnerable All (Your attacks) during their turn.
Summary: Taunted enemies gain vulnerable against your reaction attacks

Name: Meat Shield
Text:
You grant cover to all allies adjacent to you.
Allies adjacent to you gain Resist All (Burst or Blast).
Summary: Adjacent allies gain cover, resist (burst, blast)

Name: Fancy Footwork
Text:
When you shift, the shift distance is increased by 1 square.
You do not become Hindered when using the Shift maneuver
Summary: +1 Shift. Avoid penalty on Shift Maneuver.

Name: Quick Feet
Text:
+1 Movement Speed.
You can move 1 square or stand up from Prone as a Minor Action.
Summary: +1 Speed. Move 1 or stand up as Minor Action.

Name: Escape Artist
Text:
+3 to all defenses against Opportunity Attacks.
At the start of turn, you can make a save to ignore the Taunted condition until end of turn, or to downgrade one of the following conditions until end of turn: Slowed, Immobilized, Restrained, Grabbed.
Summary:
+3 to all defenses vs Opportunity Attacks.
Save to downgrade Taunted, Slow, Immobilize, Restrain, Grab

Name: Action Striker
Text:
On each Extended Rest, gain 1 additional Action Point. 
+1 to Action Point rolls.
Summary: +1 Action Point, +1 to Action Point rolls.

Name: Daily Striker
Text:
On Daily attack powers, gain +2 hit and +2 Crit Range.
On Daily Weapon attack powers, gain +2 damage per W.
On Daily Implement attack powers, gain +2 damage per die.
Once per day, when you reach a Milestone, you can choose to regain one of your spent Daily attack powers at random instead of gaining an Action Point.
Summary: On Daily attack powers, gain +2 damage per W/Die, +2 hit, and +2 Crit Range. Once per day, regain random Daily attack power instead of gaining an Action Point.

Name: Surge Striker
Text:
+2 Surges.
When you heal a Surge, gain +2 hit until end of your next turn, and you can save to downgrade a Combat Condition on you.
Summary: +2 Surges. On surge spent, +2 hit and save to downgrade Condition.

Name: Cunning Duelist
Text: When attacking, gain Advantage if you and the target are within 3 squares of each other and have no adjacent characters other than each other.
Summary: Advantage when you and target are within 3 squares and have no other characters adjacent.

Name: Dirty Fighting
Text: When attacking with Advantage, +1 hit.
Summary: +1 hit with Advantage.

Name: Lethal Weapon
Text:
On weapon attacks with, deal extra damage and Miss Damage:
 - [H] +1 damage and +1 Miss Damage per W.
	- [P][E] +2 damage and +2 Miss Damage per W.
On implement attacks, deal extra damage:
 - [H] +1 damage and +1 Miss Damage per damage die.
	- [P][E] +2 damage and +2 Miss Damage per damage die.
Summary: +1 damage and +1 Miss Damage per W or die.

Name: Undivided Attention
Text: Gain +2 hit on non-Secondary attacks with a single target.
Summary: +2 hit vs single target.

Name: Trapmaster
Text:
Gain lay trap power
Lay Trap (At-will) - Minor Action, Area 5 Blast 2. Effect: Create a zone of difficult terrain in blast until the end of the encounter or until you use this power again.  When a character enters the zone or ends their turn in it, you deal one half your Primary Ability damage to them, and the zone ends at the end of that turn.
Summary: As Minor Action, create Area 5 Blast 2 zone of damaging difficult terrain.

Name: Puppeteer
Text:
Gain Control Puppet power
Control Puppet (At-Will) - Minor Action, Ranged 10, targets a character. Effect: Push 1.
Summary: As Minor Action, push 1 a character within 10.

Name: Hole in the Fire
Text:
When making an Area attack, you may become Hindered until end of turn to avoid targeting an ally in the origin square.
When making a Close attack, you become Hindered until end of turn to avoid targeting an ally adjacent to you.
Summary: On Area or Close attack, become Hindered to avoid targeting an ally.

Name: Expose Vulnerability
Text: When you attack one or more enemies, they gain Vulnerable (your attacks and zones) during their next turn.
Summary: Enemies you attack are Vulnerable to your attacks during their turn.

Name: Rend Foe
Text:
Your attacks with multiple targets deal extra damage:
	- [H] +1 damage.
	- [P] +3 damage.
	- [H] +6 damage.
When hitting with an attack with a single target, you deal extra damage to an enemy within 2 squares of the target:
	- [H] +2 damage.
	- [P] +6 damage.
	- [H] +12 damage.
Summary: On single target attack hit, extra damage to adjacent enemy.

Name: Wind Waker
Text: Forced Movement you inflict is increased by 1, or by 2 if caused by an attack with Advantage.
Summary: Your Forced Movement is increased by 1, or by 2 with Advantage.

Name: Sustained Assault
Text:
+1 Arm while you have an active Summon, Conjuration or Sustain power. Your summoned creatures gain +1 Arm and extra HP:
- [H]:+5 HP
- [P]:+15 HP
- [E]:+30 HP
Summary: +1 Arm with Summon. Summons gain +1 Arm and extra HP.

Name: Slow Motion
Text:
When hitting with an attack with a single target, the target is Slowed until the end of your next turn.
Gain Advantage on attacks against Slowed, Immobilized or Restrained targets.
Summary: On single target attack hit, Slowed until end of next turn. Advantage vs Slowed, Immobilized and Restrained.

Name: Stable Affliction
Text: Enemies gain -3 to Saving Throws against your effects.
Summary: -3 to enemy Saving Throws.

Name: Confusion in the Ranks
Text: The first time you hit a non-Taunted enemy each turn, that enemy is Taunted by an ally of your choice until the end of your next turn.
Summary: On first hit each turn, have ally Taunt target.

Name: Exploit Weakness
Text: You gain Advantage against Slowed, Immobilized, Grabbed, Dazed and Weakened enemies.
Summary: Advantage vs Slowed, Immobilized, Grabbed, Dazed and Weakened enemies.

Name: Master Healer
Text:
When you use a Healing power, characters healing a Surge due to that power gain a bonus to their Surge Value:
- [H]:+5 Surge Value
- [P]:+15 Surge Value
- [E]:+30 Surge Value.
Summary: Healing grants bonus to Surge Value.

Name: Saving Grace
Text: When you use a Healing power, characters healing a Surge due to that power can make a Saving Throw to end an effect that a save can end or to downgrade a condition until end of your next turn.
Summary: Healing grants free Saving Throw.

Name: Shield Mate
Text:
When you grant Shield Points to an ally, increase the  Shield Points granted:
 - [H] +2 SP
	- [P] +6 SP
 - [E] +12 SP
Summary: Extra SP to allies.

Name: Word of Caution
Text:
When you use a Healing power, characters healing a Surge due to that power gain +1 to all defenses until the end of your next turn.
When you grant a power bonus to a defense to an ally, that bonus is increased by 1.
Summary: Healing grants +1 to defenses. Power bonuses to a defense increased by 1 on allies.

Name: Fast Healing
Text:
When you use a Healing power, characters healing a Surge due to that power gain +3 Movement Speed until the end of your next turn.
When you grant an action to an ally, any movement or shift in that action is increased by 1.
When you grant forced movement to an ally, the forced movement is increased by 1.
Summary: Healing grants +3 Movement Speed. On actions granted to allies, +1 Movement Speed and +1 Shift. Forced movement to allies increased by 1.

Name: Rallying Cry
Text: When rolling for Initiative, allies that can see you gain +1 to all defenses until the end of the first combat round, and +1 to Initiative.
Summary: Allies gain +1 Initiative, +1 to defenses on first combat round.

Name: Adrenaline Rush
Text: When you use a Healing power, characters healing a Surge due to that power gain +2 to hit and +1 to Action Point rolls until the end of your next turn.
Summary: Healing grants +2 hit, +1 to Action Point Rolls.

Name: Point Flank
Text: Allies gain +1 to hit and +1 damage per tier against enemies you flank.
Summary: Flanking grants +1 hit, +1 damage per tier to allies.

Name: Constructive Criticism
Text: While you grant a power bonus to hit or damage to an ally, that ally gains +1 Crit Range.
Summary: With power bonus to hit or damage, allies gain +1 Crit Range.

Name: Universal Defense
Text: +1 Fortitude, +1 Reflex, +1 Will.
Summary: +1 Fortitude, +1 Reflex, +1 Will

Name: Martial Prowess
Text: +1 Fortitude, +1 Reflex, +3 Opportunity Attack Modifier
Summary: +1 Fortitude, +1 Reflex, +3 Opportunity Attack Modifier

Name: Divine Resolve
Text:
+1 Fortitude, +1 Will.\nIncrease your Surge Value:
- [P]:+9 Surge Value
- [E]:+18 Surge Value
Summary: +1 Fortitude, +1 Will, bonus to Surge Value

Name: Arcane Abjuration
Text: +1 Will, +1 Reflex, +2 to saves
Summary: +1 Will, +1 Reflex, +2 to saves

Name: Primal Endurance
Text:
+2 Fortitude.\nGain extra HP:
- [P]:+9 HP
- [E]:+18 HP
Summary: +2 Fortitude, extra HP.

Name: Psionic Prescience
Text: +2 Will, +3 Initiative
Summary: +2 Will, +3 Initiative

Name: Shadow Slumber
Text: +2 Reflex, +6 Death Saves
Summary: +2 Reflex, +6 Death Saves

Name: Universal Resource
Text: +2 Surges.
Summary: +2 Surges

Name: Martial Grit
Text: When using Second Wind, gain +4 hit on next attack, +2 to Action Point rolls until end of next turn, and you can roll a save to avoid the Vitality loss.
Summary: On Second Wind, +4 hit on next attack, +2 to Action Point rolls until end of next turn, and save avoid Vitality loss.

Name: Divine Hope
Text: When using Second Wind, gain +2 to defenses until end of next turn, you can roll a save, and gain Shield Points equal to half your Surge Value.
Summary: On Second Wind, gain SP,  +2 to defenses until end of next turn, and roll a save.

Name: Arcane Recovery
Text: When using an Encounter or Daily arcane power, roll 1d20. On a 17+, the power is not spent.
Summary: When using an Encounter or Daily arcane power, roll 1d20. On a 17+, the power is not spent.

Name: Primal Invocation
Text: You gain an additional primal Daily Attack Power, of the same level as your lowest level Daily Attack Power.
Summary: Gain additional Daily attack.

Name: Psionic Versatility
Text:
When using a psionic At-Will attack power for the first time in an encounter, gain +1 hit with that power.
You gain an additional Level 1 At-will attack power.
Summary:
On first use of psionic At-Will attack power+1 hit with that power.
You gain an additional Level 1 At-will attack power.

Name: Shadow Ghost
Text: When using Total Defense or Second Wind, gain Insubstantial until the start of next turn.
Summary: On Total Defense or Second Wind, gain Insubstantial.

Name: Paragon Utility
Text: Gain a Level 10 Utility Power.
Summary: Gain a Level 10 Utility

Name: Epic Specialization
Text: Choose a Feat Category of any feat that you have. You gain an additional feat from that category.
Summary: Gain additional feat from a category you already have.

Name: Larger than life
Text:
In combat, you occupy space as a Large creature (2x2 squares).
Your reach with all melee and touch attacks is increased by 1.
(Note: Your actual height and size is not changed)
Summary: Increase size to Large, +1 reach.

Name: Wrecking Crew
Text:
Once per turn, after you hit or miss with a melee or ranged attack, a ground square in the target's space is Difficult Terrain until end of the encounter.
You have Advantage on attacks against targets on Difficult Terrain.
Summary:
On melee or ranged attack, turn a square in target's space into Difficult Terrain.
Advantage vs targets on Difficult Terrain.

Name: Irresistible Force
Text:
Your Forced Movement is increased by 1.
After inflicting forced movement to an enemy, if that character has not received Forced Movement Damage but is adjacent to another character, you can choose to deal half Forced Movement Damage to both characters.
Summary: +1 Forced Movement. Chance to deal forced movement damage.

Name: Immovable Object
Text:
Enemy Forced Movement on you is reduced by 1.
When an enemy misses you with a melee attack, as a Free Reaction you Slide it 1 square.
Summary: -1 enemy Forced Movement. On enemy melee miss, Slide 1.

Name: Epic Explosion
Text: Once per encounter, you may spend a Minor Action to increase the size of your next Burst or Blast attack by 1.
Summary: Increase size of burst once per encounter.

Name: Epic Cleave
Text:
During your turn, your melee and ranged attacks that target at least 1 Minion can target an additional enemy.
You ignore all resistances from Swarm monsters.
Summary: Your attacks target minions for free, ignore Swarm resistances.

Name: Epic Chase
Text: While Charging, until end of turn you gain Fly Speed equal to your Speed +4, are immune to fall damage, and downgrade Slowed and Immobilised.
Summary: While charging, Fly, gain Speed, and downgrade conditions

Name: Epic Utility
Text: Gain a Level 16 Utility Power.
Summary: Gain a Level 16 Utility

Name: Multiclass
Text:
Choose a class build other than yours, provided you have an ability score of 1 or higher in its primary ability. That class becomes your multiclass. You count as having the class, power source and role of your multiclass, in addition to those of your main class.
- Add all Class Skills from your multiclass to your Class Skill List.
- Gain all Implement Training from the chosen class, and all Weapon Training in basic weapons (but not martial weapons) from that class.
- When choosing powers, you can replace up to 1 Encounter Power, 1 Daily Power and 1 Utility Power from your main class with powers from the chosen class. For any given type of power, you cannot have more powers from the chosen class than from your main class this way.
- Gain one Multiclass Option. If your main class has the Controller role, gain two Multiclass Options instead.
Summary: Multiclass to a new class. Gain a Multiclass Option

Name: Class Specialization
Text: Gain two Class Specialization Options
Summary: Gain two Class Specialization Options

Name: Multiclass Defender
Text:
Gain the following power:
Multiclass Defender Taunt (Encounter) - Minor Action
Close Burst 1, targets enemies in Burst.
Effect: Taunted (save ends). While taunted this way, the target provokes Opportunity Attacks from you when ignoring your Taunt
Special: Recharge this when you spend an Action Point.
Summary: 1/encounter, Taunt enemies in Close Burst 1

Name: Multiclass Striker
Text:
Gain the following power:
Multiclass Striker Damage (Encounter, No Cooldown)
Free Action (Trigger: you hit an enemy with an attack), targets an enemy hit by the triggering attack.
Effect: Deal extra damage equal to your Primary Ability.
Special: Recharge this when you spend an Action Point.
Summary: 1/encounter, deal extra damage equal to your Primary Ability.

Name: Multiclass Leader
Text:
Gain the following power:
Multiclass Healing Word (Encounter) - Minor Action
Ranged 3 (safe), targets you or an ally.
Effect: Heal a Surge.
Special: Recharge this when you spend an Action Point.
Summary: 1/encounter, heal a Surge

Name: Multiclass At-Will
Text: Choose a Level 1 At-Will attack power from your multiclass. You can use that power once per encounter, and you recharge it when you spend an Action Point.
Summary: Gain At-Will attack from multiclass.

Name: Multiclass Armor
Text: Choose a type of Armor or Shield that your multiclass is trained in. You gain the correponding Armor Training feat, provided you meet its requirements.
Summary: Gain Armor Training from multiclass.

Name: Multiclass Weapon
Text: Choose a type of Martial Weapon that your multiclass is trained in. You gain training with that weapon, but you have -1 Hit on attacks with that weapon unless they are powers from your multiclass.
Summary: Gain Weapon Training from multiclass, but use with penalty on non-multiclass powers.

Name: Multiclass Ability
Text: Choose a primary or secondary ability for your multiclass, if that ability score is lower than 3. When using powers from your multiclass, you treat that ability score as 3.
Summary: NA

Name: Class Specialization: Encounter
Text: You gain an additional Encounter Attack Power, of the same level as your lowest level Encounter Attack Power
Summary: Gain extra Encounter power.

Name: Class Specialization: At-Will
Text: You gain an additional Level 1 At-Will Attack Power
Summary: Gain extra At-Will power.

Name: Class Specialization: Reliable
Text: Choose up to 2 Encounter and/or Daily Attack Powers. The first time you use them in an encounter, they gain Reliable
Summary: 2 Powers gain Reliable.

Name: Class Specialization: Accurate
Text: Choose up to 2 At-Will or Encounter Attack Powers. The first time you use them in an encounter, gain +1 Hit.
Summary: 2 Powers gain +1 Hit.
